author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Restore the names GeometryExtended2017 to let the unit tests to succeed..  2017 is a copy of 2017Plan1. Also changed 2018 to 2018Plan0 and copy 2018Plan36 as 2018. These actions came after discussion at the SIM meeting on April 22,2022\

### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run2-gex132A Restore the names GeometryExtended2017 to let the unit tests to succeed
